tutorial.speak:
Only group leaders can schedule events, but any group member can see a list of events and comment on them.
The calendar has multiple views for month...
week...
single day...
or an agenda.
Regardless of the view, double click on any event to view it's details.
On the details page, there is an open discussion for any group members to comment on the event.
Group leaders can click the edit button to modify or delete the event.
